Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Nice spot for high quality food & drink at the right price. Seems to us like a good reliable kind of place.  Recommended! üëçüèª

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Location is great, but food is average. I do not recommend the burgers. The meat tastes weird, and it has American cheese on it. When you order a burger you expect to look it like a burger, but for 13e you get something oddly shaped. Eye and taste buds were left unsatisfied.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: This is our food recommendation for the area! We had a great sandwich, panini and fries for a reasonable (if not low) price. The atmosphere was very welcoming and relaxed and we had a great time here!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text:
Great location, great service, very tasty food.. perfect for a quick bite by the canal.
I was blessed with a sunny day on my first day strolling around Amsterdam and I read about this place and loved all of it.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text:
Nice place for breakfast.
Tasty food. Friendly personnel.
Recommend!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Had lunch here and found the menu to be satisfactory for all due to its huge selection of sandwiches both cold and hot. It‚Äôs still in the tourist area but it felt fairly authentic given that. Beautiful and tasty vegetables on sandwiches. We ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: An excellent place to grab a bite to eat and a drink.  Food was superb and good service.  Staff were friendly.  An initial wait for a table as it was busy and for good reason.  Very good selection of hot and cold sandwiches and other dishes.  Cosy atmosphere.  Highly recommended.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: One word...SANDWOW!! My goodness man, these friendly folks craft a KILLER open-faced sando.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: The place to eat good and healthy food. Staff is welcoming. Desserts are home made. Sandwiches are awesome with fresh products as you can see on the pictures. Prices are very good. I can only recommend it.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Best sandwiches ü•™ in Amsterdam we have been several times and never disappoints! Always super fresh! Lovely staff and super cute setting next to the canal. A must every visit to Amsterdam!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Great location, on the beautiful Singel canal, one of the best, most probably the best canal in Amsterdam. The food is simple, but very well prepared. The inside space is quite small, but in a sunny day there are tables outside, where you ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Waited 30 minutes for a sandwich. Taste wasn‚Äôt good as the bread was very dry. Staff was really friendly though!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: A great, casual place for a bite to eat. Their "sandwiches" are topped with ingredients to the full, making sure you get your money's worth! Makes me wish all sandwiches were like this.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: 100% would recommend this place if you want to stop for a quick yet nourishing bite! Absolutely loved the sandwiches and toasted eggs. Very welcoming as well!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: The perfect cheap eat in Amsterdam! Food was really good and fairly priced. Welcoming environment and nice staff.. also had the nice company of a little spider at our table :P

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Always so good. I eat here every time I‚Äôm in Amsterdam. Hearty, healthy sandwiches are be perfect stop to combat jetlag. Snag a seat by the canal if the weather permits!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Just fantastic. Great food and very good vegetarian options. We went in for sandwiches and what we got was just incredible. I loved the brown bread with vegetables and red pepper hummous. Must try the homemade lemonade with mint and orange too!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Great and simple food : soup, sandwichs, pies...tasty, fresh, big portions and not that expensive. I think it‚Äôs one of my most favorite restaurants in Amsterdam, since the balance price/quality is so good. My go-to : homemade lemonade and Goat Cheese tartine (26), preferably from the cute balcony

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: My favourite place in town!! Tasty food and lovely staff... great place and service... don't forget to order the vanilla strawberry milkshake and the Apple pie!!!  Sandwich of the picture number 32

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Loved the food, atmosphere, cordial and friendly service with smile. wonderfully clean toilet :-) for those who admires hygiene

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Super lovely cafe in the jordaan district. Generous with their ingredients and they even give different choices of breads! Staff are absolutely friendly as well :)

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Absolutely extraordinary. Best meal I had when visiting Amsterdam.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Love this place for lunch. The soup and sandwiches are always fresh and tasty.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Great value for food! Try their fried eggs for the typical Dutch taste or the sandwiches for a healthier option.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Love this place. Food is delicious and location is just perfect. Cozy cafe next to the water but far away enough from busy crowds.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Tasty lunch with amazing views. Grabbed a sandwich with Gouda cheese.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: No reason to go here anymore. Different menu, more expensive, not greeted by staff. Waited, got up and left.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Great place if you want to pop in for some lunch. They have lovely sandwiches and the place just breathes comfort food. The portions are good, the food is tasty, everything is very straightforward and unpretentious.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: European style outdoor cafe with great food,  canal side dining, and reasonable prices, all surrounded by historic Dutch architecture.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Yummy affirdable big portion sandwiches and booze to enjoy next to the canals

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Friendly service, sleepy of course like nearly everywhere here, sandwich was okay, but nothing extraordinary, coffee was terrible with a sharp and bitter taste that comes from dirty machines, but even though I said it extremely friendly and ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Cheap and tasty food! The soup was delicious! My personal low point was that they almost only had breadies.. but they were delicious anyways! üòäüëçüèº

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Delicious food, friendly staff. What else could you ask for? Great little find! Fresh ginger tea too.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: A cosy place with a wide choice of food. A bit pricy and can be busy in peak times.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Excellent food, brilliant location and quality staff with great sightseeing tips.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: One of the best breakfasts I've ever had, decent price

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Small cafe with nice food. Prices are fair.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: AMAZING food, but very busy place. Highly recommended for prices and portion sizes.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Lovely place to stop for lunch, a snack or just drinks. Excellent smoothies!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Good alternative for apple cake if you find winkel 43 too sweet

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Tasty food, rather cheap and the waiters are fast.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Nice chill cafe in the heart of Amsterdam with delicious food and coffee!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: We have been coming here for years. We loved the place. This time everything was just so average. I got the oven melted goat cheese sandwich with brown bread. The taste was just not delicious. It used to be sooo good. Bread was not crispy ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Fancy food. It was not possible to get regular bread and eggs. I had a tuna melt and that tastes good.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Nice ambience and staff - good olive tapenade!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: About a year ago, this used to be a reliable place to have a tasty sandwich made with fresh ingredients. But something has changed. Our food was truly regrettable: my smoked salmon sandwich was smaller than advertised (one slice, not two), ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: This is an absolutely fantastic lunch spot. I had the goat cheese and grilled pumpkin sandwich. This was a open-face sandwich, with arugula topped with pine nuts. Absolutely delicious. Additionally, wait staff were very kind, gracious, and attentive. Overall, this was a great find.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Tasty sandwiches

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: I was recommended by another tourist I'd met in another city who called them the "best sandwiches EVER." Indeed they turned out to be amazing sandwiches! Very sweet staff. It was hard to not make this a regular lunch visit during my short stay in Amsterdam.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: The food here was amazing, the best lunch in Amsterdam. The staff were very friendly and made room for us even though it was busy. The prices are fantastic for what you get, go for the oven melts and the homemade lemonade is perfect!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Singel 404 is one of our favourite places to have lunch during the weekends. The price/quality ratio is great and the staff is very friendly. We normally order a sandwich together with some soup. This is great and very tasty. It can ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: I used to visit this place a lot. Now days quality food ( broodjes) and also the service is really poor. I think they have changed owners. It‚Äôs is sad because the food here used to be really really good. I always ordered the warm broodje 33.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: A small cafe with great selection of sandwiches. Friendly and attentive service. I had the goats cheese & pesto with veggies on corn bread. It was delicious! The portion was very generous!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Lovely caf√© by the canal, serving very good (both cold and hot) sandwiches. Perfect for a lunch break while walking around Amsterdam. I had the grilled ch√®vre with pumpkin and arugula on a bagel, and strongly recommend it.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Love this place, always visit when I'm in Amsterdam. Chicken and bacon on farmers cornbread was delicious and their take on nachos was amazing!! If they added coriander to the nachos too, it would have been perfect. Thanks!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Best breakfast in Amsterdam!!! Local and cosy spot.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Very warm and cosy place to relax and have a good coffee, brunch or lunch. The staff is very nice, the food is good and rather healthy without being excessively expensive. Maybe the only small downside is the quantity. ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Altijd gezellig! Great lunch options (salads, soups, excellent sandwiches) and indulgent desserts, cozy atmosphere, friendly staff. The place is very small, so expect some waiting time over lunch and in the weekends. The wait is totally worth it. During summer, you can enjoy your meal or drink looking at the Singel canal. Zo leuk! üòÑ

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Great choice of sandwiches and friendly team, with a great view on the canal

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Not a place to miss! Our favorite spot for lunch in Amsterdam. Amazing soups, huge sandwiches and awesome desserts! on a side note - service tends to be a little on the slow side, so don't go there if you are starving - plan ahead!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: SHOCKING. Food took over 1.5 hours to come and was badly burnt. We were about to walk out and they insisted we sit. Coffees came cold to both my table and our friends - they cannot make proper coffee. They also burnt their bacon and told ‚Ä¶

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: I've been a client of Singel 404 since 2016. The place has recently changed management and everything dropped in quality. Coffee is watery, breakfast is of poorer quality. It turned into an average touristic place.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Homemade Chocolate cookies with cream waz awsome awsome and awsome. Must try .

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Lunch time. People are full inside. Service is good and fast. I always chose the food named with the shop brand. So the "singleclub" sandwich didn't disappointed me. The taste is very abundant.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: I found this place in 1999 when on holiday from the US, and I visit every time I'm in Amsterdam. I may have flown over from London for a day trip to see a museum and get a BLT sandwich here. The BLT is amazeballs. üòÅ

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Very cozy place, mostly sandwiches on menu, but they are huge and really tasty ones. Look for daily proposals on whiteboards. Big variety of drinks

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Nice location and atmosphere with friendly and helpful staff. Big portioned sandwiches with diverse toppings. Excellent lunch spot.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: The food was amazing! Made fresh, huge portions, super tasty, I had a hard time making a choice as everything and the price was super affordable. Highly recommend it.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Lovely place for breakfast and lunch as they offer breakfast plates, sandwiches, bagels, oats etc. The cafe is located directly at the water where you can watch people, bicycles and cars passing by while catching some sun. Highly recommended!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Not as cheap as it used to be. But portions are just huge. Has been serving top sandwiches for years now. Though I do miss their Sandwich of the Week. Let's hope it'll make a comeback in the future!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Not bad sandwich especially the hot oven ones....Good place to have a bunch... Mdriate prices and a nice menu.. they open a little late in the morning....

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Small restaurant, but cosy. Ideal to go there while walking around to see the city. Apple pie is good, traditional dutch pastry to try.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Good food, and nice service.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Attentive staff (which is rare in Holland) and a great terrace canal-side. Interesting eats, with exotic flavors (if you are American) however very tasteful.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: The best sandwich you'll find in Amsterdam! The selection is amazing, and you can enjoy a beer on the canal with their outdoor seating.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: The staff was really nice and a table outside of this cafe under sun was just a treat. We ordered fried eggs with beef on toasts and a fresh croissanr both of which were divine

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: I liked it a lot! The the waitresses were friendly und the food was excellent. If youre looking for a cozy lunch/cafe, this is the one.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Low priced restaurant, but I wouldn't consider the food is good. It feels frozen. The place is very small rather than "cozy".

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: hot  Sandwich is the  best thing I had  in this city. also good location. it's perfect to have  a  brunch and walk to visit museum.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: This is a typical local amsterdam place. I have lunch here a lot. A real authentic little lunch bar. Great sandwiches and good wine :)

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Great place for lunch! Portions are huge and delicious. Nice little spot to rest while walking in the center. No wifi though.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Best place in town to have a lunch :)! You'll get a good lunch for a reasonably price :)! Friendly people and if you're lucky you'll get a spot outside. Oh and they dont have Wifi ;)

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Good food, friendly service, great outdoor atmosphere. Sandwich portion was big enough to fill me up.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Hard to get a table but definitely worth it. Good food in a great location, especially in spring and summer when sitting outside is viable.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: One of my favorite lunch places; very reasonable prices, good taste, terrace on the canal and always wonderful service by the friendly ladies working there.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: 1 star because it smelled really bad inside. They need to do something about that. It is unhygienic. Sandwiches are great but not if you smell sewage while having lunch.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Have tried to eat here around 5 times, different times of the year. Not once, I got to meet a waiter sitting at the tables, so ended up standing up and walking away after 15-20 minutes.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Wow, was that a great sandwich. Very fair prices and a great selection of food. Would recommend.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Surprisingly good food. Cosy place, pleasant laid back atmosphere.  Perfect for Sunday lunch.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: The food was amazing and the service was great. I had the "Club Xtra" and it was delicious! Hope to eat there again soon!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: This is my favorite place in Amsterdam. Every time when I'm in the city a pray for a free and sunny table outside. I wish I could try all the menu.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Brie, smoked chicken, quacamole, sun-dried tomato panini is a show-stopper. Large portions and great prices.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Service not attentive at all, and the "sandwich" we got was nowhere near the value for money we expected. Much better alternatives in the neighborhood.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Great place to have heavy breakfast or brunch. Nice view of the river. Nice place to sit outside on a sunny day.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Very good and fresh !

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: I didn't have high hopes. I was wrong, thankfully. Staff were pleasant and the food was really nice.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: The most delicious soups in Amsterdam :)

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Wonderful sandwiches, but the service is a bit slow. Also, there isn't that much space, so be careful about that.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Tasty sandwiches, relaxed service and comfortable atmosphere. Great for a quick, tasty, filling lunch.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Excellent food and coffee, generous portions and the waitress looks like Carla Delivigne. Who could ask for anything more?

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Friendly staff, great food and the prices are extremely reasonable compared to the rest of the city center. Definitely recommended.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: One of the best lunch spots around. The Tuna Melt is super delicious and the staff is friendly.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: The food here is great ! The prices are fair and the service is sweet and fast. The tables by the canal are beatiful !

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Really good sandwiches, nice service and super relaxed environment. Really enjoyed my meal in this place

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: The food here is amazing with very generous portions. Excellent brunch option.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Excellent food for lunch. Had mamazing tuna pannini and club sandwiche they both were excellent quality and tasted amazing!!!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Seems like a cozy and friendly eatery however portions are quite small especially the drinks.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Cozy place, terrace on the canal, tasty warm and cold sandwiches, pleasant service, fair price. Satisfied.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Very cozy, very tasty. The best crossaint I've had in a long time! I love it here

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Fantastic view and reception, she is actually great with a big smile and so warm :)

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: One of the best sandwiches of the NL. Oven-made ones are the most delicious and nr 42 is my recommendation.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Highly recommended for a good club sandwich!! They're expensive but very tasty!

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Huge, filling sandwiches for a reasonable price right in the middle of the city. Probably the best place to have lunch in the center.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
Review Text: Great food!! Unfortunately the service was slow, and the waitress asked us for a tip.

Name: Eetcafe Singel 404
